thread.title: Mookie Betts, Other Red Sox Stage Line Drive Contest During Spring Training
thread.title_full: Mookie Betts, Other Red Sox Stage Line Drive Contest During Spring Training

title: Mookie Betts, Other Red Sox Stage Line Drive Contest During Spring Training
text:
by Sam Galanis on Tue, Mar 21, 2017 at 3:40PM 2,092 Tweet 
The Boston Red Sox didnâ€™t let the fact that only half the team traveled Tuesday stop them from making sure everyone got their competitive juices flowing. 
The Red Sox who didnâ€™t make the trip to Tampa, Fla., to take on the New York Yankees practiced at JetBlue Park on Tuesday morning. They managed to play a different type of game in the process. 
Outfielders Mookie Betts, Steve Selsky and Rusney Castillo and infielders Josh Rutledge and Deven Marrero put on a line drive contest to entertain the other members of the team who stayed behind. Line drive contest anyone? @mookiebetts & @Dmarrero305 ðŸ†š 
â€” Boston Red Sox (@RedSox) March 21, 2017 
The Red Sox will be hoping the squad in Tampa makes contact like that, too, when Chris Sale and Co. face the Yankees on Tuesday night. 
Thumbnail photo via Kim Klement/USA TODAY Sports Images
